pullrequest.title: change project name back to contain major version number

content.raw: If you want to check that `find_package(ignition-math2 ...)` now works fine on Windows, you can import the changes in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/119/check-if-find_package-ignition-math/diff in this PR, otherwise we just wait for this to be merged and then we merge that PR.
content.html: If you want to check that find_package(ignition-math2 ...) now works fine on Windows, you can import the changes in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/119/check-if-find_package-ignition-math/diff in this PR, otherwise we just wait for this to be merged and then we merge that PR.
